createTransactionAllowedBySystem.description: If true CREATE transactions can be initiated by a system

transferOwnershipAllowedBySystem.description: If true TRANSFER transactions can be initiated by the a system

createTransactionAllowedByUser.description: If true CREATE transactions can be initiated by an user

transferOwnershipAllowedByUser.description: If true TRANSFER transactions can be initiated by the an user

verifySignature.description: If true the transaction signature will be verified

validateSchema.description: If true the transaction data will be validated against the transaction schema

divisibleAsset.description: If true the asset is divisible

fungibleAsset.description: If true the asset is fungible

privateAsset.description: If true the asset is a private asset

whiteListing.description: If true the whitelisting is active

blackListing.description: If true the blacklisting is active

blockchainProviderVersion.description: the version of the blockchain provider

HTTPBlockchainIPAddress.description: the IP address of the blockchain server

HTTPBlockchainPort.description: the port of the blockchain server

systemAsset.description: If true the asset is an internal system asset

minAmountValue.description: Minimal possible value for digitalAsset output amount

maxAmountValue.description: Maximal possible value for digitalAsset output amount
